attributes.action: Ban Fortnite - Add an internet proxy which blocks Fortnite HTTP requests
attributes.background: Fortnite is causing major sleep and deprivation and causes education for children to become more difficult.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for banning specific games. That's the responsibility of the Video Standards Council, which is responsible in the UK for implementing the PEGI age rating system which is used in over 30 countries throughout Europe.

You can find out more here:

http://videostandards.org.uk/Home/
